scripts.pack: yarn run build && yarn run rebuild && electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.yml --win --linux
scripts.pack:all: yarn run build && yarn run rebuild && electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.yml --win --linux --mac
scripts.pack:win: yarn run build && yarn run rebuild && electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.yml --win
scripts.pack:mac: yarn run build && yarn run rebuild && electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.yml --mac
scripts.pack:linux: yarn run build && yarn run rebuild && electron-builder -c ./electron-builder.yml --linux
